lender.name: Rodney Howard Browne
lender.loan_because:
God's Plan by Rodney Howard Browne
It is easy to lose your bearings in the hurricane. You can't find your way through the circumstances you are facing. In Luke's words, "All hope of our being saved" is deserted. At that tough, gut-wrenching moment, God claims, "Don't be alarmed, I am in possession of a plan.". People facing intense difficulty find it difficult to target anything except for the exploding waves and stinging winds. We've heard from the Lord that none will be lost.". We find stability in gales through what God has told.
Your bent will be to turn to another source for strength rather than the Word of the Lord. The only anchor of stability that can hold you firm, irrespective of how intense the gale-force winds, is God's written Word. All this makes me think about a statement made by one of the standard Jewish soothsayers, which supports the loyalty of the Lord God and His Word.
The following words flow from the seasoned hand of Isaiah : "But now, so claims the LORD, your Creator, O Jacob, and He who formed you, O Israel, 'Do not fear, for I have redeemed you ; I have called you by name ; you are Mine. When you pass through the waters, I'll be capable of being with you ; and through the brooks, they will not overflow you'" ( Isaiah 43:1-2 ). "Do not fear, I have called you by name." What a great thought. Isaiah wasn't writing of literal waters or exact brooks. He promises, "I will be with you." he's your anchor.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I will loan - (Just haven't had the funds) but soon - because I feel it is important for those who have, to help create wealth, in order to help those who do not have - creating a sustainable social upliftment programme.
lender.occupational_info: I've started an employment initiative within the informal traders in South Africa. I manufacture and produce alternative energy products and we are using grass roots selling and distribution through these hawkers. Creating employment while supplying a clean and safe alternative energy to families using un-safe & un-healthy fuels - like wood, coal, paraffin, candles...

lender.occupational_info: I oversee the cleanup of contamination at old military facilities from World War II and the Cold War era. Many of these facilities are in remote parts of Alaska, next to Native villages or in traditional subsistence hunting and gathering areas. Many of these villages are still living in Third World conditions, or are only recently emerging from those conditions.

Kiva gives me an opportunity to do that and I just love your site :)

lender.name: Rodney Howard
lender.loan_because:
What God Wants Us to Hear by Rodney Howard Browne
Put simply, stick with the evangelizing plan God has sure to praise and use. Don't try and be so creative and adorable that folks miss the truth. No need for unintelligible and crazy substitutes that entertain but barely convict the lost and edify the saved. Will you notice something here? This exhortation isn't addressed to the hearer, it's for the spokesman.
The person that is to do that's the one exclaiming the message. Be ready to do it in season and out of season. Don't get on up and begin with an apology that you didn't quite have sufficient time to prepare.
That doesn't wash." And do so faithfully when it's convenient and when it's not. Sadly , in a shocking number of churches today, God's people are being told what they have to hear rather than what they have to hear. A watered-down gospel may attract gigantic crowds ( for some considerable time ), but it has no never-ending impact. I can't say I have been capable of finding any place in the Scriptures where God expresses the least bit of doubt for drawing numbers.
Enjoyable the curious itching ears of our postmodern audiences is an exercise in futility.
Frankly , I'm going to resume doing exactly that, by God's grace, until the day He calls me home. And I think there is a fast-increasing number of supporters who long for nutritive messages based on the Word of the Lord Almighty not human standpoint. The world urgently needs more Christians with the fervor and faith of Paul. Will you be one of them? Will you reply the charge? If this is the case there's no better time than now to start.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I want to help less fortunate, hardworking people.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to travel around the world and I have been touched by how hard mothers work to care for their families. I want to help woman to help themselves. I want them to know that there are people that care for them and believe in them.
lender.occupational_info: I taught elementary and middle school for 14 years. I am now back in school working on a masters degree in order to become a Physician's Assitant. I also have my own photography business. You can see my work at the website provided.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: Because with a little help everyone can achieve great things
lender.occupational_info: Helping to improve the access to quality health systems and management

lender.name: Loic
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of will, the power of human creativity and I am convinced that through easing access to funding, we can trigger economic growth in less privileged countries and raise a maximum of people out of poverty

lender.occupational_info: I help professionals with their computer related problems.

lender.name: Belo
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe the world could be a better place if we treated each other with compassion and dignity. I want to provide people with little opportunity a chance to better their lives. We take too much for granted in this world.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I care about others.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a website that helps people plan their trips/vacations.

lender.name: Ida Marie Vibeke
lender.occupation: Employee at Bjarke Ingels Group A/S

lender.name: Leah
lender.loan_because: In parts of Asia and Africa, women are sold into sex-slavery, are abused by husbands and are kept illiterate as a means to conduct foreign policy in the most oppressed of countries. As women have been abused and discriminated against in the cruelest of ways in these foreign countries, it is extremely important to lend aid to women in countries whose “war on terror” has become a “war on misogamy.” The general idea is that the more oppressed a country is, the more poverty, and therefore the worse the treatment of its female citizens. The kind of aid I will be lending will help them create opportunities for themselves so they will be able to break away from the violence associated with this new “war” by helping them start businesses of their own, making them better equipped to be in control of their own success. Nicholas Kristof and Sheryl WuDunn explore this idea brilliantly in their Pulitzer-prize winning book, “Half the Sky: Turning Oppression into Opportunity for Women Worldwide,” by explaining how economic progress will be best brought about by tapping into the potential of the female population. Because as Kristof so truthfully puts it, “Women are not the problem. They are the solution.”
lender.occupational_info: I have created a Kiva micro-lending program called “Women Entrepreneurs” that I hope to get both the women of Newport Beach, California and girls of Sage Hill School involved in. The idea is that if women are given opportunities to make a good living for themselves, they will become more confident and independent, will better be able to provide for their families, will become more respected in their communities, and will therefore be treated slightly differently in their society at large. I plan to supplement my efforts by simultaneously becoming an advocate for global women’s rights, and joining and partnering with organizations that I can encourage the Newport Beach activists to become a part of. Throughout this process, I will be continuing my research, and will make an effort as to alert the State Department of my findings towards the end of the academic year.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I think this is a wonderful way to help people help themselves. I am in awe of the initiative demonstrated by the people who take out the loans and then repay them so others can be helped.
lender.occupational_info: I put people to sleep so they can have surgery painlessly.

lender.name: Nata
lender.loan_because: I am engaged in wholesale horse ammunition in Ukraine. My partner Biznen lives in Germany, it buys goods and sends me to Ukraine for further sale. In October, we partner plan to open e-shop, need a loan for the purchase of goods, which quickly realized.
lender.occupational_info: My work is related to the sale of ammunition in Ukraine for horse, horses, special equipment for the maintenance of horses in the stables.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: it is a way of being able to give back

lender.name: PAUL
lender.loan_because: God is good to all and his tender mercies are over all that he has made - Psalms 145:9 For his anger lasts only a moment, but his favor lasts a lifetime; weeping may remain for a night, but rejoicing comes in the morning - Psalm 30:5

lender.name: Justice And Peace
lender.loan_because: We are learning about global poverty in our Justice and Peace class. We came across this website and thought it would be beneficial to both us and the people whom we lend money to.

lender.name: Cloudberry
lender.loan_because: I believe in the micro-credit model as a mechanism to contribute to real economic development

lender.name: johan
lender.loan_because: This is a brilliant way to help people to help themselfs .
lender.occupational_info: I work in the maritime business i have many friends and colleuges from phillipines so i will start my first loans in that area.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference to others who are having a go.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small business specialising in the service & repair of sewing machines and overlockers.

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: It's easy to forget that there are other people beyond your immediate circle of friends and family, and that many of those people are seriously struggling. Kiva is an amazing way to not only help people, but it encourages a way for those who have it tough to keep working, keep building. As opposed to simply slapping a band-aid on the problem of poverty, Kiva is a real cure, in that it helps people create their own solutions for stability and success in life. Three cheers for Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: I am a singer and writer of songs... and also an actor. I love the arts, love to perform... the world is a stage.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: its sustainable!

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because:
I want to help in the efforts to secure freedom and equal rights for all of the women across the globe.
Women will change the world through their peaceful and compassionate nature and their common sense. They are already doing it. We will continue to undo the damage caused by greedy men, misogynistic religions and rulers, and archaic laws that prevent women from fulfilling their potential in life.
I'm a Goddess worshiper who wants to see the female aspect of God be revered as much as, or even moreso, than the male aspect. We've had quite enough of this man-god business and now it's time to move on to a more enlightened, spiritual existence. I do not want to give money to any organization that promotes archaic religious beliefs (this includes Christianity, Judaism, Islam, and Hinduism.) I also don't wish to give my money to men so they can spend it on cars, beer, pay-per-view games, 900 lines, and prostitutes. I only trust women to do what's right and that's who I wish to help.
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate a pagan website, offering information about paganism, witchcraft, and Wicca. I also offer information on feminism, women's rights, domestic and child abuse, sexual violence, Christianity and other male-centric religions (and the damage they have caused to women worldwide), and any other topic that captures my interest. I work from home and my website provides a nice life for me. I would like to see many other women around the world be able to live as I do, without the stress and physical burden of doing ALL of the work (if men are so d*mn strong why is it that they want women to do all the work?) and also taking care of the children. Women are under way too much pressure and they aren't being offered the education that they need to create a better life and more fulfilling relationships for themselves. I have high hopes for the future of womankind and I can't wait to see the progress we will make within my lifetime.

lender.name: Thom
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I do stuff that needs to be done that I can do.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: in memory of my brother

lender.occupational_info: At Havertys we understand your goal of having a warm and inviting home -- not just a house. Furniture Built For Life We offer over 120 store locations throughout the Southeast.

lender.occupational_info: I'm teacher in one computation school, graduated. I Live with my family in Brazil and one of my biggest dreams is can openning my own business. I expect that someone can trust me. My Blog provides advice and information on getting started to youngs entrepreneurs.

lender.loan_because: I know you are going to too and I don't want you to have to do it by yourself.

lender.occupational_info: I am raising my amazing kid. Teaching him (as best I can) how to be a great soul filled with love and compassion for others. To embrace nature and the joys of the great outdoors and to be all that he can be.

lender.occupational_info: We own a bed and breakfast Inn and we love taking care of others and serving them to the very best of our ability.

lender.occupational_info: C.C.C. community + commitment = change

lender.occupational_info: I work with students at a university. I help them to learn to be responsible adults.

lender.occupational_info: My firm conducts survey research to help decision makers in business and government.

lender.name: Avni
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of empowering others to improve their lives and the lives of those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I work at Oakland University, were I support efforts that connect those who want to help students at a university with the students. The best part of my job is seeing when donors get to meet the students they have so generously helped. I hope to have a similar impact through Kiva.
